titleStmt.title: A proclamation, continuing the adjournment of the current Parliament, from the first Thursday of April next, to the twenty ninth of that moneth, 1686.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the twentieth two day of March, 1686. And of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Colin McKenzie Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
